verbose_text: Recent data have shown that PI3K / Akt signaling enhances the effects of Hedgehog in MBs and their cerebellar precursors, and that it may represent an indispensable precondition for the molecular realization of the Hedgehog signal [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PI3K/Akt signaling enhances the effects of Hedgehog
